poll_list.title: Set Debt Ceiling Instant Access Module Parameters for Multiple Vault Types - February 15, 2021

discourse_list.title: IAM-DC Parameters (2): LRC-A, BAT-A, BAL-A, MANA-A, ZRX-A, KNC-A, RENBTC-A

content.content: Hey all, We are releasing the second batch of proposed DC-IAM parameters for smaller vault types. Both ‘gap‘ and ‘ttl’ values below are based on the same decision making process and intuition that we already described when proposing these parameters for ETH-A, whereas ‘line’ values are based on our risk premium table. This time we aren’t polling for ‘line’ parameter, since these vault types are having very limited usage (only 5m DAI debt from these 7 vaults in aggregate). This proposal also concludes our planned DC-IAM implementation proposals for “vanilla collaterals”. We should propose DC-IAM parameters for UNI LPs in the coming weeks or when oracle audit is confirmed. We should propose a higher ‘line’, yet still a bit conservative, since we aren’t convinced the keeper ecosystem around UNI LP auctions is currently healthy. Remaining vault types where DC-IAM could be implemented are stablecoin vaults and PSM, however we do not suggest using it since we do not want to risk DAI liquidity squeeze. In other words, ‘gap’ for stablecoin vaults or PSM would need to be very high and IAM DC implementation becomes trivial. Proposed DC-IAM Parameters | Vault Type | Debt Exposure | Current line | Proposed line | gap       | ttl      | |------------|---------------|--------------|---------------|-----------|----------| | LRC-A      |     2,243,702 |    3,000,000 |    10,000,000 | 2,000,000 | 12 hours | | BAT-A      |       854,278 |    2,000,000 |     3,000,000 | 1,000,000 | 12 hours | | BAL-A      |       779,357 |    4,000,000 |     5,000,000 | 1,000,000 | 12 hours | | MANA-A     |       463,804 |    1,000,000 |     2,000,000 |   500,000 | 12 hours | | ZRX-A      |       248,436 |    5,000,000 |     5,000,000 | 1,000,000 | 12 hours | | KNC-A      |        26,741 |    5,000,000 |     5,000,000 | 1,000,000 | 12 hours | | RENBTC-A   |       421,485 |    2,000,000 |     2,000,000 |   500,000 | 12 hours |     Do you agree with proposed DC-IAM parameters?  Yes No - Comment bellow Abstain     0 voters     This Signal will be closed this Friday, February 12th. If confirmed, proposed parameters will proceed to on-chain poll next Monday, February 15th.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining the proposed DC-IAM parameters for smaller vault types, including LRC-A, BAT-A, BAL-A, MANA-A, ZRX-A, KNC-A, and RENBTC-A. The author also mentions that they will propose DC-IAM parameters for UNI LPs in the coming weeks. The post includes a poll asking for agreement with the proposed parameters and will be closed on February 12th. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Unlike last weeks, I’m going to put this group up as a single poll. My reasoning for this is as follows:  Gas prices make deploying and voting in polls relatively expensive. Probably not contentious - This batch mostly contains the lesser-used set of vault types. No one is voting against in this signal. Even without these, there are 16 polls set to go out on Monday. Some might argue that that is excessive.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
None of the topics listed match

content.content: This signal has passed as part of this on-chain executive proposal. Thanks to all who voted both on-chain and off-chain.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
